text: Puducherry is a union territory of India. It has four administrative divisions: four districts, viz. Pondicherry, Mahé, Yanam and Karaikal. Pondicherry district has the largest area and population. Mahé district has the smallest area and population. All the four districts retained borders of the French India, and were organised as a union territory of Puducherry after the de facto transfer of French India territories to India in 1954. ==Districts== ISO 3166-2 Code District Headquarters Population (2011) Area (km²) Density (/km²) Official website IN-PY-KA Karaikal district Karaikal 200,314 160 1,252 http://karaikal.gov.in/ IN-PY-MA Mahé district Mahé 41,934 9 4,659 http://mahe.gov.in/ IN-PY-PO Pondicherry district Pondicherry 946,600 293 3,231 http://py.gov.in/ IN-PY-YA Yanam district Yanam 55,616 30 3,272 http://yanam.gov.in/ ==References== *
